commit.message: Auto merge of #7380 - popzxc:compile-test-helper, r=flip1995 Improve panic message on "Found multiple rlibs" error in compile-test Related to #7343 When I first met this error I was pretty much confused, so I thought it may be a good idea to: - Give a hint on what to do to users that don't want to dig into specifics and just want to quickly resolve the issue. - Give a link for those who are interested in details. ## Old appearance: ## New appearance: *Please write a short comment explaining your change (or "none" for internal only changes)* changelog: none
